profile:
At Reliance Holmes Heating & Air Conditioning, the safety and well-being of both our Customers and our Team Members is always our top priority. We are actively monitoring the Coronavirus (COVID-19) situation and are taking precautionary measures to aid in keeping our communities safe. We have implemented strict safety protocols to provide both our Customers and Team members with peace of mind during this challenging time. We continue to provide the exceptional customer experiences we are so well known for and want you to know that we are here for you when you need us.

To help with prevention, we are taking the following precautionary measures to protect our Customers.
888-837-1451 is a TOLL FREE No., please feel free to contact!! 

Our Team Members have been equipped with an ample supply of:

* Hand sanitizers
* Disinfectant wipes
* Masks
* Single-use gloves
* Boot covers

We know that this is a difficult time for all and we want you to know that we will be there for you and are taking all the necessary precautions to keep you and your family comfortable and safe.


Reliance Holmes Heating and Air Conditioning is one of the largest and best known HVAC sales and service providers for many reasons, including:

	We've been in business for over 45 years since 
	We're one of the largest HVAC contractors in Ottawa, 
	Many of our products are eligible for an assortment of government and manufacturer rebates 
	We sell and install only the highest standard of heating, cooling and air quality products and services.
	We offer comprehensive repair services and protection plans to keep our customers comfortable year-round.
	Our HVAC technicians are some of the best-trained professionals in the industry.
	We genuinely care about your well-being and will work hard every day to earn your business and trust.

profile:
Enjoy the highest grade in technology, reliability & durability with Water Treatment equipment from Hills & Valley Water Systems. Not only does our equipment offer highest in efficiency standards and reliability, but we offer competitive pricing.

Our staff brings 21 years of experience in solution implementation & design; we are always up to date with current water treatment methodologies and practices in conformance with the highest standards. Hills & Valley Water Systems is a water treatment company experienced in residential, commercial and industrial water solutions. H & V Water Systems is experienced in treating both rural well and municipal water problems.

Hills & Valley Water Systems is a licensed well contractor with the Ministry of Environment and has M.O.E. licensed well technicians on staff. Our proficiency in pump sizing & installation benefits the end users water quality because H & V Water Systems understands the critical requirements of water treatment from the pump & pressure system.

H & V Water Systems is equipped to assist you with all of your water needs. There is no water quality issue we cannot solve.
service_area: Serving Ottawa and all the surrounding regions. East to Hawkesbury, Alexandria, Lancaster. West to Pembroke, Renfrew, Gananoque.
products: Hills & Valley Water Systems specializes in treating all manners of water quality issues. Hardness, Iron, Sulphur, Tannins (tea like colour to the water), Salty taste, Ultraviolet Sterilization for bacteria. H & V is also a Licensed Well Contractor with the Ministry of Environment, with Licensed Well Technicians providing well pump and pressure system installation.
services: Water Treatment Installation & Design, Water Analysis, Pump and Pressure System Installation, Troubleshooting and Repair. Rental Programs.
specialities: Better Products, Better Quality, Better Service, Better Prices!
licenses: M.O.E. Well Contractor, M.O.E. Well Technician
